title: David Gilmour Live at the Circus Maximus, Rome 2025
overview: The film of David Gilmour's 2024 return to Rome's historic Circus Maximus as part of the Luck and Strange tour, his first in nearly a decade. The spectacle, filmed against the backdrop of the ancient ruins of Rome, blends solo tracks from Davidâ€™s most recent album, Luck and Strange, as well as classic Pink Floyd anthems.
